#summary Using Netbeans, and getting started with development (or viewing the source)
#labels Code,Checkout,Started

= Code Checkout =

Perform a checkout of the code into a folder named of your choice.  Open up netbeans and perform an Open Project (Ctrl-Shift-O).  Navigate to the directory which you've checked the code out to, and you should now be able to work from there.

  # Checkout the code
  # Start up NetBeans
  # Navigate to _Open Project_ in the _File_ menu or perform *Ctrl-Shift O*
  # From the *Open Project* dialog locate the directory which you checked-out the code
  # Press the _Open Project_ button

Done!
